channel.title: Hail the Octopus.
channel.description: Hi! I am Adrika, a second year undergrad at IISER Kolkata. I like long hikes, birdwatching, reading, and cooking. Have a nice day!

item.title: Basics
item.description: DNA Watson and Crick’s hypothesis had immediately suggested a possible self-replication method for DNA because of complementarity in base pairing. At this junction, possible modes of DNA replication: Conservative / Semi-conservative / Dispersive Meselson-Stahl Experiment proves replication is semi-conservative Bacteria grown in N(15) medium incorporate N14 in a light medium - CsCl density gradient centrifugation revealed. Identification of Replication Fork John Cairns identified the replication fork by allowing replicating DNA in cells to incorporate tritiated thymidine.

item.title: Regulation of DNA replication
item.description: Regulation Q. Why don't somatic cells have telomerases? They prevent the accummulation of harmful mutations in this way.
